lastSession.summary: v6.1.0: Stale plugin cache detection and self-healing. session-start.sh checks GitHub for latest version (24h TTL). fix-stale-cache.sh bootstrap script replaces stale caches. Fixes the self-referential version detection loop.
completedTasks: Added external GitHub version check to session-start.sh with 24h TTL cache
Created fix-stale-cache.sh bootstrap script for stuck users
Added stale cache warning to user banner and Claude context
Added Troubleshooting section to README with one-liner fix
nextSteps: Run fix-stale-cache.sh to update the local plugin cache from v4.4.2 to v6.1.0
Or run ./dev-mode.sh enable as immediate workaround
Test /flow with Agent Teams specialist team
